argument.name: string
argument.description: Optional. A default initial value for the connection string.

page.description: Displays a dialog box to create or edit an ADO connection string
page.discussion: The A5_CONNECTIONSTRING() function allows you to create or edit a connection string. The function displays the standard Windows Data Link Properties dialog box. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
page.example: dim cs as C cs = a5_connectionstring()
